mapper.select: select id,name,parent_id,description,sort,path,if_leaf,platform_id,code,create_user from content_category where id=#{id} AND platform_id = #{platformId}
mapper.delete: delete from content_category where id=#{id} AND platform_id = #{platformId}
mapper.select: SELECT * from content_category where path like CONCAT('%-',(SELECT id from content_category where code='${code}'),'-%')
SELECT * from content_category where path like CONCAT('%-',#{parentId},'-%')
select max(sort) from content_category where platform_id=#{platformId} and parent_id=#{parentId}
select * from content_category where sort<#{sort} and parent_id=#{parentId} and platform_id=#{platformId} order by sort desc limit 0,1
select * from content_category where sort>#{sort} and parent_id=#{parentId} and platform_id=#{platformId} order by sort limit 0,1
